original_text: Thou shalt know also that thy seed shall be great, and thine offspring as the grass of the earth.
korean_text: 네 자손이 많아지며 네 후손이 땅의 풀과 같이 될 줄을 네가 알 것이라

sentences.original_text: that thy seed shall be great,
and thine offspring as the grass of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 자손은 땅의 풀과 같으리라.
